title: Enterprise Asset Classification Registry
description: Definitive source for all recognized critical asset types managed within the GAC ecosystem, used for cross-service registration and policy enforcement.

asset_types.name: Core Application Configuration
asset_types.description: Critical configuration data defining runtime environments.

asset_types.name: Core Financial Transaction Manifest
asset_types.description: Integrity manifests for irreversible financial operations.

asset_types.name: Policy Version Lifecycle Manifest
asset_types.description: Manifests tracking changes and approvals for governance policies.

asset_types.name: System Integrity Hash Manifest
asset_types.description: Hardware and firmware integrity verification artifacts.

asset_types.name: Governance Policy Definition
asset_types.description: The executable definition of a system governance rule.
